titleStmt.title: [Legenda aurea sanctorum, sive, Lombardica historia] [Wyllyam Caxton]
Legenda aurea. English. 1483
titleStmt.author: Jacobus, de Voragine, ca. 1229-1298.
Caxton, William, ca. 1422-1491.

notesStmt.note: "Thus endeth the legende named in latyn legenda aurea that is to saye in englysshe the golden legende"--p. CCCCxliiii.
T.p. lacking?; title suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Attributed to Jacobus de Voragine by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre- 1956 imprints.
Dated and signed at end: "... at Westmestre the twenty day of nouembre the yere of our lord MCCCClxxxiii ... by me Wyllyam Caxton."
Imprint suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints and STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
